author: AlexAlbert41
body:
#### PR description:

This is a backport of #49373 and a response to the concerns raised in the previous back port: #49217. 

This PR updates 2025 HMT shower thresholds for pp collisions to be implemented for Era 2025F. The thresholds change should now be correctly mapped to the era change.

Details were presented by @kakwok at the TSG Meeting on August 20. [1].

[1] https://indico.cern.ch/event/1571789/#35-exo-report-on-l1t-muon-show

#### PR validation:

Tuning of trigger thresholds for redistribution of rates within CSC station-rings for optimized physics performance.
title: update mds trigger thresholds with era change CMSSW_15_0_16
